note:
I discovered Mastodon somehow, and what a happy accident! Civil discourse by interesting and entertaining mostly likeminded people
I am far left leaning and am interested in and support causes that reflect that.
I am a cat person, and like to knit, so that's fun. I love to read, fantasy and mysteries. I also like bingeing TV series, science fiction (Star Trek) space western (Firefly) crime procedurals (Bones) British series like Dr. Who, Call the Midwife, (mysteries on BBC too)&Schitt's Creek
